attributes.action: Extend BST by 3 weeks in each of March and October
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By bringing forward BST by 3 weeks in March and delaying the change to GMT by 3 weeks in October (effectively into November) maximum use of daylight will be achieved with massive savings to business and personal consumers (and of course helping in the climate change crusade!)
